bibl.title: News from Smikrines and Chairestratos. Verses 645-660 of Epitrepontes Sandbach-Furley.
bibl.note: Edition of a new fragment of the Menander Michigan Roll [see: Cornelia Römer, News from Smikrines and Pamphile. Two New Fragments of Epitrepontes 786-803 and 812-820 Sandbach-Furley, ZPE 196 (2015) pp. 49-54, 2 figg., 1 pl.]
